name: Trail Blazer Mountain Bike
description: Designed for rugged terrains, this bike ensures smooth rides with a sturdy frame, advanced suspension, and premium tires. Ideal for mountain trails.

name: Speedster Road Bike
description: Perfect for long road trips, this bike combines lightweight materials, aerodynamic design, and high-performance gearing for maximum speed.

name: Urban Cruiser Hybrid
description: A versatile bike for both city commutes and casual trails, featuring a comfortable seat, ergonomic handlebars, and durable tires.

name: Xtreme BMX Pro
description: Built for stunts and tricks, this BMX bike has a robust frame, responsive brakes, and durable wheels for extreme adventures.

name: E-Rider Electric Bike
description: Experience effortless rides with this electric bike featuring a powerful motor, long-lasting battery, and multiple speed settings.

name: Road Runner 500
description: Combining speed and comfort, this road bike has a sleek frame, lightweight components, and high-quality tires for smooth journeys.

name: Trail Master Mountain Bike
description: Engineered for off-road performance, this bike features a tough frame, precision gearing, and excellent shock absorption for tough trails.

name: City Escape Hybrid
description: A perfect mix of road and trail features, this hybrid bike ensures versatility and comfort for all types of riders.

name: StuntPro BMX
description: Designed for freestyle tricks, this BMX bike features a strong frame, stable handling, and durable tires for every stunt enthusiast.

name: VoltTrail Electric Bike
description: Powerful and efficient, this electric bike features a high-capacity battery, smart controls, and premium comfort for long journeys.

name: Alpine Cruiser Mountain Bike
description: Conquer steep trails effortlessly with this bike's robust design, superior suspension, and excellent traction for mountain adventures.

name: Sprint Max Road Bike
description: Built for speed enthusiasts, this road bike features a lightweight frame, advanced braking system, and aerodynamic design.
